S04n437:1: atha khalu śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya divyaiścandanacūrṇavarṣairabhyavakīrya ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhituṣṭuvuḥ—
S04n437:17: na te kalpasahasrāṇi jātu yāsyanti durgatim ||8 ||
S04n437:20: mokṣyante ca laghuṃ sarve chittvā vai kleśabandhanam |
S04n437:24: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte prāñjalayastasthuḥ,
S04n437:26: atha khalu cābhāsvarā devaputrāstathāgataṃ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ divyairnānāprakāraiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanachatradhvajapatākābhiḥ saṃpūjya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
S04n437:43: evaṃ khalu bhikṣava ābhāsvarā devāstathāgatamabhisaṃstutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:44: atha khalu subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgataṃ bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇamanekamaṇiratnakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrapratyuptena ratnajālenābhichādya tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya cābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhyastāviṣuḥ—
S04n437:65: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ subrahmadevaputrapramukhā brahmakāyikā devāstathāgatamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya ekānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:66: atha khalu te śuklapākṣikā māraputrā yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāman |
S04n437:68: pratyakṣe'smi bale tavātivipule mārasya ghorā camū
S04n437:69: yatsā māracamū mahāpratibhayā ekakṣaṇe te jitā |
S04n437:70: na ca te utthitu naiva kāyu trasito no vā girā vyāhṛtā
S04n437:73: te tubhyaṃ na samartha bodhisuvaṭā saṃcālituṃ kampitum |
S04n437:76: bhāryā ceṣṭatamā sutāśca dayitā dāsyaśca dāsāstathā
S04n437:78: hastā pādaśirottamāṅgamapi vā cakṣūṃṣi jihvā tathā
S04n437:79: tyaktā te varabodhicarya caratā tenādya vibhrājase ||23 ||
S04n437:80: uktaṃ yadvacanaṃ tvayā subahuśo buddho bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ
S04n437:83: sā caiṣā pratipūrṇa tubhya praṇidhistāriṣyase prāṇinaḥ ||24 ||
S04n437:84: yatpuṇyaṃ ca stavitva vādivṛṣabhaṃ lokasya cakṣurdadaṃ
S04n437:88: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo māraputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:89: atha khalu paranirmitavaśavartī devaputro'nekairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto jāmbūnadasuvarṇavarṇaiḥ padmaistathāgatamabhyavakīrya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
S04n437:105: cakṣu bhava parāyaṇa iha bhuvi tribhave ||29 ||
S04n437:106: priyu bhava naramaru na ca khali viṣaye
S04n437:108: dinadarśi pariṣadi na ti samu tribhave
S04n437:109: nāthu gati parāyaṇu tvamiha hi jagataḥ ||30 ||
S04n437:110: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavo vaśavartidevapramukhāḥ parinirmitavaśavartino devaputrāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:111: atha khalu sunirmito devaputro devasaṃghaparivṛtaḥ puraskṛto nānāratnapaṭṭadāmaistathāgatamabhichādya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
S04n437:115: utpanno iha loki cetiyo divi bhuvi mahitaḥ ||31 ||
S04n437:131: vande tvāṃ trisahasri adbhutaṃ divi bhuvi mahitam ||35 ||
S04n437:132: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ sunirmito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namaskurvan ||
S04n437:133: atha khalu saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ sārdhaṃ tuṣitakāyikairdevairyena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n437:134: upasaṃkramya mahatā divyavastrajālena bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhisaṃchādya saṃmukhamābhirgāthābhirabhyastauṣīt—
S04n437:155: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ saṃtuṣito devaputraḥ saparivārastathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namasyamānaḥ ||
S04n437:156: atha khalu suyāmadevaputrapramukhāḥ suyāmā devā yena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n437:178: evaṃ khalu te suyāmadevaputrapramukhā devāstathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:179: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ trāyatriṃśakāyikairdevairnānāpuṣpadhūpadīpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvarachatradhvajapatākāvyūhaistathāgataṃ saṃpūjya ābhirgāthābhirabhyastāvīt—
S04n437:180: askhalitā anavadyā sadā susthitā merukalpā mune
S04n437:183: tasya viśeṣu yena bodhidrume mārasenā jitā ||46 ||
S04n437:193: mā khu śramaṇarāju bādhiṣyate bodhimaṇḍe sthitaḥ |
S04n437:194: na ca bhavatu babhūva tebhyo bhayaṃ no ca kāyeñjanā
S04n437:196: yatha ca purimakebhi siṃhāsane prāpta bodhi varā
S04n437:197: tatha tvayā anubuddha tulyā samā anyathā tvaṃ na hi |
S04n437:198: samamanasa samacitta sarvajñatā sthāma prāptaṃ tvayā
S04n437:199: tena bhava svayaṃbhu lokottamo puṇyakṣetraṃ jage ||50 ||
S04n437:200: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ devaputraistrāyatriṃśaistathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalīkṛtastathāgataṃ namaskurvan ||
S04n437:201: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ sārdhaṃ caturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrairyena tathāgatastenopasaṃkrāmat |
S04n437:202: upasaṃkramyābhimuktakacampakasumanāvārṣikadhānuskārimālyadāmaparigṛhītā apsaraḥśatasahasraparivṛtā divyasaṃgītisaṃpravāditena tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā ābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhistuṣṭuvuḥ—
S04n437:214: ārya vimukti labhanti te hi sarve ||53 ||
S04n437:216: na ca puna vidvamadena jātu mattaḥ |
S04n437:220: yatra hi tādṛśu jātu sattva loke |
S04n437:223: evaṃ khalu caturmahārājapramukhā mahārājakāyikā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:224: atha khalvantarikṣā devāstathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkramyābhisaṃbodheḥ pūjākarmaṇe sarvamantarīkṣaṃ ratnajālena kiṅkiṇījālena ratnachatrai ratnapatākābhī ratnapaṭṭadāmai ratnāvataṃsakairvividhamuktāhārapuṣpadāmārdhakāyikadevatāparigṛhītairardhacandrakaiśca samalaṃkṛtya tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma |
S04n437:245: na ca te mado jāyati vismayo vā ||60 ||
S04n437:246: evaṃ khalvantarīkṣadevā bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭutyaikānte'vatasthivantaḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
S04n437:247: atha khalu bhaumā devāstathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe sarvāvantaṃ dharaṇītalaṃ suśodhitopaliptaṃ gandhodakapariṣiktaṃ puṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ca kṛtvā nānādūṣyavitānavitataṃ ca tathāgatāya niryātayanti sma |
S04n437:252: na ca ahu aspṛśitvā bodhi uttheṣya asmāt ||61 ||
S04n437:259: yatra ku raju loke sarva obhāsitāste
S04n437:264: sarva tava dadāmo bhuṅkṣvimāṃ tvaṃ yatheṣṭam ||64 ||
S04n437:267: dharmakatha kathentī ye'pi vā tāṃ śṛṇonti
S04n437:269: evaṃ khalu bhaumā devā bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭatyaikānte tasthuḥ prāñjalayastathāgataṃ namasyantaḥ ||
